original_title: Nörgel & Söhne oder was vor 9742 Jahren vormittags neun Uhr begann, Teil 1
overview: The history of money goes back to when people decided to settle down. They look for a physical equivalent to exchange goods… Nörgel and his family move from one place to another in search of tools to make their work easier. They also start to produces their own tools. Part one of the animation trilogy Nörgel & Sons.
title: Nörgel & Söhne oder was vor 9742 Jahren vormittags neun Uhr begann, Teil 1
